tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: Movement
tutorialPickups.description: Use WASD or the ARROW keys to move

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: Camera Zoom
tutorialPickups.description: Use [,] to zoom in/out the camera

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: TOOLTIPS
tutorialPickups.description: Hover over anything on the map to get information about it

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: ATTACK
tutorialPickups.description: Moving into an enemy attacks it. They will immediately attack back.

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: MANA
tutorialPickups.description: Hitting enemies generate mana. This resource is used to activate specials.

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: SPECIALS
tutorialPickups.description: These are active abilities that can trigger unique effects. They need mana to be activatable.

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: PASSIVES
tutorialPickups.description: These are unique effects that activate automatically based on specific events or conditions. They show up in the UI Panel above.

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: SKIP TURN
tutorialPickups.description: Press H to skip a turn.

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: POTIONS
tutorialPickups.description: Potions can be consumed to give buffs or bonus effects.

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: EQUIPMENT
tutorialPickups.description: Equipment can be picked up to be equipped in one of the slots above (Weapon, Armor, Runes)

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: VENDORS
tutorialPickups.description: These special characters give you unique rewards or items to buy

tutorialPickups.name: Tutorial: MINIBOSS
tutorialPickups.description: Kill the Miniboss to exit the dungeon
